DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety efficacy CVI silicone-hydrogel lens wear extend wear basis period 7 day 6 night Acuvue 2 soft contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Study Soft Contact Lens Use With 7 Day Extended Wear
DOC.criteria: 1 . Be least 18 year age date evaluation . 2 . Require lens power 0.50 6.00 diopter sphere 1.00 diopter refractive astigmatism willing wear lens eye . 3 . Be correctable visual acuity least 20/25 eye spectacle . 4 . Be good general health , base his/her knowledge . 5 . Be able willing adhere instruction set forth protocol able keep specified appointment . 6 . Possess wearable visually functional eyeglass . 1 . Previously unsuccessful contact lens wear . 2 . Rigid gas permeable contact lens wear within past 12 month . 3 . Previous refractive surgery ; current previous orthokeratology treatment . 4 . Subject wear lens modify monovision modality ( multifocal lens one eye ) . NOTE : subject may wear monovision lens time study unless wear spherical monovision lenses prior enrollment . 5 . Aphakia , keratoconus irregular cornea . 6 . A known history corneal hypoesthesia 7 . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) anterior segment abnormality infection eye , lid , associate structure . 8 . Ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . i.e. , Sjögren 's syndrome , type II diabetes , etc . 9 . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear , include limited : History corneal ulcer , corneal infiltrates fungal infection . Pterygium , pinguecula corneal scar within visual axis Pathological dry eye associate finding ( example : Sjögren 's syndrome , lupus erythematosus , sclerodermia ) Neovascularization ghost vessel > 1mm limbus Seborrheic eczema , seborrheic conjunctivitis History papillary conjunctivitis great Grade 2 ( Mild ) Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) 10 . Known sensitivity care system use study . 11 . Poor personal hygiene 12 . Current pregnancy lactating ( best subject 's knowledge ) subject planning pregnancy within next 13 month . 13 . Any active participation another clinical study within 30 day prior study . 14 . Subject member , relative household member office staff , include investigator ( ) . Subjects must read , indicate understanding , sign Informed Consent Form .
